channel.title: Commands help

item.title: Commands help
item.dc:creator: @DcnScape DcnScape
item.description:
@DcnScape wrote:

[code] }
if(command.startsWith(“home”)) {
teleportToX = 3088;
teleportToY = 3490;
sendMessage(“you have teleported to home”);

}[/code]
You need to separate the other two commands that are on the top & bottom of this one.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

[quote=“str2own99, post:6, topic:375775”]}
if(command.startsWith(“home”) //Voule Command Generator
teleportToX = 3088;
teleportToY = 3490;
sendMessage(“you have teleported to home”);
} [/quote]
The fuck you putting two closing braces and no opening braces? ERRORRRRRRR

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

[code] if(command.startsWith(“home”)) {
teleportToX = 3088;
teleportToY = 3490;
sendMessage(“you have teleported to home”);

}[/code]

I think ^^

means more than, so > 0 means 1+
= means more than OR equal to so 0+ in your case.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help
item.dc:creator: @DcnScape DcnScape
item.description:
@DcnScape wrote:

The ‘}’ may have to go one space up, I’m not where or what by you added the command too.

} if(command.startsWith("home") teleportToX = 3088; teleportToY = 3490; sendMessage("you have teleported to home");

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help
item.dc:creator: @kc_titan_911 kc titan 911
item.description:
@kc_titan_911 wrote:

I did everything everyone told me to do can some1 teamviewer me and help me?

this is what i have now

if(command.startsWith(“home”)){ //Voule Command Generator
teleportToX = 3088;
teleportToY = 3490;
sendMessage(“You have teleported to home”);

}

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help
item.dc:creator: @DcnScape DcnScape
item.description:
@DcnScape wrote:

Get rid of the player rights thing no need. And depending where you added it, you need to put a ‘}’ on top of the “if”.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help
item.dc:creator: @kc_titan_911 kc titan 911
item.description:
@kc_titan_911 wrote:

I added some commands to my new blank source and they work perfectly fine for my owner acc but when another acc other then me tries to do the commands they dont work. I dont have the rights set at 3 i have them set at 0 so everyone can do them. So WHAT AM I DOING WRONG??

Here is an example of one of my commands

if(command.startsWith(“home”)&& playerRights >= 0){ //Voule Command Generator
teleportToX = 3088;
teleportToY = 3490;
sendMessage(“you have teleported to home”);

}

I AM BRAND NEW TO CODING SO IF THAT LOOKS TERRIBLE DONT MAKE FUN OF ME JUST TELL ME WHAT I DID WRONG

Read full topic
